scripts.copy: cp src/index.html dist/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/*/bootstrap.min.* dist/ && cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist/
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && rm -rf build && mkdir build
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: browserify -t [babelify --presets es2015 --presets react] -p [css-modulesify -o build/main.css] -o build/app.js src/index.jsx
